endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: mode

param_schema.description: Determines if you produce a quick experimental video or an upscaled interpolated one. (small ~20s, medium ~60s, upscaled ~2min, upscaled-and-interpolated ~4min)

parameters.description: Determines if you produce a quick experimental video or an upscaled interpolated one. (small ~20s, medium ~60s, upscaled ~2min, upscaled-and-interpolated ~4min)

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

parameters.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

parameters.name: prompt

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.description: The prompt has a small effect, but most of the video is driven by the subject images

parameters.description: The prompt has a small effect, but most of the video is driven by the subject images

param_schema.description: The checkpoint to use for the model

param_schema.description: Apply the style from this image to the whole video

param_schema.description: How strong the style is applied

param_schema.description: Use geometric circles to guide the generation
